implementation.useCase: Copy.ai uses Claude to power its AI-driven content creation platform, helping marketing teams generate high-quality content faster and more cost-effectively. Claude is used for long-form content generation (blog posts, articles, thought leadership pieces), brand voice adaptation, and research/fact-checking.
implementation.problem: Marketing teams spending excessive time and money on routine content creation tasks, with high costs for outsourcing to writers, freelancers, and agencies.
implementation.integrationMethod: Incorporated across most of Copy.ai's generative AI products

metrics.sourceText: Copy.ai's tools reduce workloads for marketing teams by enabling them to produce four times the output for a quarter of the cost.
Some of our customers have gone from spending $15,000 to $20,000 a month on content creation with writers, freelancers, and agencies to now spending less than 20% of that
